Evaluation (evaluate)

The evaluation module provides metrics for assessing forecast accuracy.

Evaluation metrics for decline curve analysis forecasts.

decline_analysis.evaluate.rmse(y_true, y_pred)[source]

Root Mean Square Error.

Return type:

float

decline_analysis.evaluate.mae(y_true, y_pred)[source]

Mean Absolute Error.

Return type:

float

decline_analysis.evaluate.smape(y_true, y_pred)[source]

Symmetric Mean Absolute Percentage Error.

Return type:

float

decline_analysis.evaluate.mape(y_true, y_pred)[source]

Mean Absolute Percentage Error.

Return type:

float

decline_analysis.evaluate.r2_score(y_true, y_pred)[source]

R-squared coefficient of determination.

Return type:

float

decline_analysis.evaluate.evaluate_forecast(y_true, y_pred)[source]

Comprehensive evaluation of forecast performance.

Return type:

dict

Evaluation Metrics

Root Mean Square Error (RMSE)

\[RMSE = \sqrt{\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} (y_i - \hat{y}_i)^2}\]

Mean Absolute Error (MAE)

\[MAE = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} |y_i - \hat{y}_i|\]

Symmetric Mean Absolute Percentage Error (SMAPE)

\[SMAPE = \frac{100\%}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \frac{|y_i - \hat{y}_i|}{(|y_i| + |\hat{y}_i|)/2}\]

Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE)

\[MAPE = \frac{100\%}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \left|\frac{y_i - \hat{y}_i}{y_i}\right|\]

R-squared (R²)

\[R^2 = 1 - \frac{SS_{res}}{SS_{tot}} = 1 - \frac{\sum_i (y_i - \hat{y}_i)^2}{\sum_i (y_i - \bar{y})^2}\]

Where: - \(y_i\) are the actual values - \(\hat{y}_i\) are the predicted values - \(\bar{y}\) is the mean of actual values - \(n\) is the number of observations
